text.div:
Media Modality

Detailed information about the type of the image - its kind, purpose, or the kind of equipment used to generate it.

Copyright Statement: This resource includes content from the Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Standard, Copyright 2011 by the National Electrical Manufacturers Association

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/media-modality defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
diagram DiagramA diagram. Often used in diagnostic reports
fax FaxA digital record of a fax document
scan Scanned DocumentA digital scan of a document. This is reserved for when there is not enough metadata to create a document reference
retina Retina ScanA retinal image used for identification purposes
fingerprint FingerprintA finger print scan used for identification purposes
iris Iris ScanAn iris scan used for identification purposes
palm Palm ScanA palm scan used for identification purposes
face Face ScanA face scan used for identification purposes

name: Media Modality
description: Detailed information about the type of the image - its kind, purpose, or the kind of equipment used to generate it.
copyright: This resource includes content from the Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Standard, Copyright 2011 by the National Electrical Manufacturers Association
